title: Teen Honors Sister on Raksha Bandhan
description: A heartwarming story of sibling connection unfolds this Raksha Bandhan.  A 15-year-old Mumbai girl, who received a hand transplant, travels to Gujarat to tie a rakhi on her donor's brother.  This act transcends religious boundaries, celebrating the spirit of the festival and the life-giving gift of organ donation.  The emotional reunion highlights the power of human compassion and the enduring bond between siblings. Witness this beautiful gesture of gratitude and the remarkable story behind it.  Learn about the transplantation process and the importance of organ donation. This inspiring tale of hope and healing will touch your heart.
